column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Is this some kind of combat training ? "
#Text=Aiwei says : " Not exactly , they are rehearsing for a dance premiere next month . "
#Text=Suyin says : " That 's it for today everyone . "
#Text=Aiwei says : " Allow me to introduce the matriarch of the Metal Clan , Suyin . "
#Text=Suyin says : " Please call me Su .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I make it my business to know who 's visiting my city .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , you 're a dancer .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Dancer .
#Text=Leader .
#Text=Wife .
#Text=Mother .
#Text=Collector of rare meteorites .
#Text=You 'll find people here have many skills and interests .
#Text=Korra , why did you lie when Aiwei asked if there was anyone else with you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=I , uh , I did n't .
#Text=I mean ... " Bolin says : " Oh ... " Korra says : " How did you know I was lying ?
#Text=" Aiwei says : " I 'm a truth seer .
#Text=When people lie , their heart rate and breathing increase .
#Text=I can sense the most subtle of changes .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Thanks to Aiwei , there are no secrets in our city .
#Text=" Korra says : " We came with Republic City 's Chief of Police .
#Text=She did n't want anyone to know she was here .
#Text=I 'm sorry I did n't tell you .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Lin 's here ?
#Text=Well , I would love to say hello .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , you two know each other ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " You 're joking , right ?
#Text=Lin never told you about me .
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=Why would she ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " I 'm Lin 's sister .
#Text="
